signin.title: Welcome to PlebDevs
signin.description: Choose your identity model: Nostr-first (your Nostr profile drives your identity) or OAuth-first (traditional login with background Nostr capabilities)

emailCard.title: Email Magic Link (OAuth-First)
emailCard.description: Your email profile is the source of truth. Background Nostr keys generated automatically for protocol participation.

nostrCard.title: Nostr Extension (Nostr-First)
nostrCard.description: Your Nostr profile is the source of truth. Use your own keys with full custody control.
nostrCard.helpText: Requires Alby, nos2x, or Flamingo browser extension. You control your keys, we sync your profile from Nostr relays.

githubCard.title: GitHub Account (OAuth-First)
githubCard.description: Your GitHub profile is the source of truth. Background Nostr keys generated automatically for protocol participation.

anonymousCard.title: Anonymous Account (Nostr-First)
anonymousCard.description: Temporary Nostr keys for instant access. We sync from any existing Nostr profile or use generated defaults.
anonymousCard.helpText: Platform manages keys temporarily. Sync with existing Nostr profile or upgrade to permanent account later.

recoveryCard.title: Account Recovery (Nostr-First)
recoveryCard.description: Restore access using your private key from ephemeral accounts
recoveryCard.helpText: Recover anonymous, email, or GitHub accounts that have stored private keys. NIP07 users should use the Nostr extension instead.

_comments.providers: Authentication provider configuration - controls which authentication methods are available
_comments.providers.email.enabled: Enable/disable email magic link authentication. When false, email option is completely removed from auth flow.
_comments.providers.email.maxAge: Email verification link expiry in seconds. Default 86400 = 24 hours. Links expire after this time.
_comments.providers.email.rateLimit.requests: Maximum number of email magic link requests allowed per time window per IP/user
_comments.providers.email.rateLimit.window: Rate limiting time window in seconds. Default 900 = 15 minutes. Prevents spam requests.
_comments.providers.nostr.enabled: Enable/disable NIP07 Nostr browser extension authentication. Requires user to have compatible extension.
_comments.providers.nostr.autoCreateUser: Auto-create user account on first successful Nostr login. If false, accounts must exist first.
_comments.providers.nostr.usernamePrefix: Text prefix for auto-generated usernames from Nostr pubkey. Example: 'nostr_' creates 'nostr_a1b2c3d4'
_comments.providers.nostr.usernameLength: Number of characters from pubkey to use in auto-generated username. Recommended: 6-12 characters.
_comments.providers.github.enabled: Enable/disable GitHub OAuth authentication. Requires GITHUB_CLIENT_ID and GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET environment variables.
_comments.providers.github.autoCreateUser: Auto-create user account on first successful GitHub login. If false, accounts must exist first.
_comments.providers.github.usernamePrefix: Text prefix for auto-generated usernames from GitHub login. Example: 'gh_' creates 'gh_username'
_comments.providers.github.allowedUsers: Array of GitHub usernames allowed to sign in. Empty array allows all users. Use for access control.
_comments.session: Session management configuration - controls how user sessions are stored and managed
_comments.session.strategy: Session storage method: 'jwt' (stateless tokens) or 'database' (server-side storage). JWT is faster, database more secure.
_comments.session.maxAge: Maximum session duration in seconds before forced re-authentication. Default 2592000 = 30 days.
_comments.session.updateAge: How often session is refreshed in seconds. Default 86400 = 1 day. Extends session on activity.
_comments.security.requireEmailVerification: Force email verification before account activation. Users must click email link before access.
_comments.security.allowSignup: Allow new user registration. If false, only existing users can sign in. Useful for private instances.
_comments.security.redirectAfterSignin: Default URL to redirect users after successful authentication. Usually '/' for homepage.
_comments.security.cookieSecure: Use secure HTTPS-only cookies. Now handled automatically: true in production (HTTPS), false in development (HTTP) for compatibility.
_comments.pages: Custom authentication page URLs - allows customizing where auth flows redirect
_comments.pages.signin: Sign-in page URL. Users are redirected here when authentication is required.
_comments.pages.verifyRequest: Email verification page URL. Shown after user requests magic link.
_comments.pages.error: Authentication error page URL. Shown when auth fails with error details.
_comments.pages.signout: Sign-out confirmation page URL. Optional custom page after logout.
_comments.features: UI feature toggles - controls what authentication options are visible to users
_comments.features.showEmailProvider: Show email authentication option in sign-in UI. Hides email form if false.
_comments.features.showNostrProvider: Show Nostr authentication option in sign-in UI. Hides Nostr button if false.
_comments.features.showGithubProvider: Show GitHub authentication option in sign-in UI. Hides GitHub button if false.
_comments.features.showAnonymousProvider: Show anonymous authentication option in sign-in UI. Hides anonymous login if false.
_comments.features.showRecoveryProvider: Show account recovery option in sign-in UI. Hides recovery form if false.
_comments.features.enableGuestMode: Allow guest/anonymous access to content without authentication. Useful for public content.
_comments.features.requireTermsAcceptance: Show terms of service acceptance text on sign-in page. Required for legal compliance.
_comments.features.showLayoutSections: Show section headers ('Quick Sign In' and 'Advanced Options') in the two-column layout.
_comments.features.showInfoCard: Show the informational card explaining the Universal Nostr Integration system.
_comments.features.useColumnLayout: Use the modern two-column layout. If false, falls back to single-column stacked layout.
_comments.copy: All user-facing text for authentication pages - fully customizable for branding and localization
_comments.copy.signin: Sign-in page text configuration including titles, descriptions, buttons, and error messages
_comments.copy.signin.emailCard: Email authentication section text including form labels and button text
_comments.copy.signin.nostrCard: Nostr authentication section text including button text and help information
_comments.copy.signin.messages: Dynamic messages shown based on user actions (success, errors). Supports {email} placeholder.
_comments.copy.verifyRequest: Email verification page text shown after user requests magic link
_comments.copy.verifyRequest.steps: Step-by-step instructions shown to users for completing email verification
_comments.copy.error: Error page text configuration including error messages for different failure types
_comments.copy.error.errorMessages: Specific error messages mapped to NextAuth error codes (CredentialsSignin, EmailSignin, etc.)
